---
title: "Breakdown with number of ORFs per sample"
author: "Nate Olson"
date: '`r Sys.Date()`'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ProjectTemplate)
load.project()
```
```{r}
funct_anno_df %>% group_by(Sample_ID) %>% 
    summarise(count = n()) %>% 
    separate(Sample_ID, c("Sample_Code",
                          "Collection_Date",
                          "Sample_Type"),
             remove = FALSE,
             sep = "_") %>% 
    knitr::kable()
```
```{r}
```{r}
funct_anno_df %>% group_by(Sample_ID) %>% 
    summarise(count = n()) %>% 
    separate(Sample_ID, c("Sample_Code",
                          "Collection_Date",
                          "Sample_Type"),
             remove = FALSE,
             sep = "_") %>% 
    filter(Sample_Code %in% c("ZVI","RW"), Sample_Type == "W") %>% 
    knitr::kable()
```
